title: Remove Internet Identity from Admin Panel and restore username/password login

requirements.text: Remove all Internet Identity authentication logic from the Admin Panel page (frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx), including all useInternetIdentity hook imports, Internet Identity login UI components, authentication checks, and any code that depends on Internet Identity authentication state.

quotes: Stop adding 'Internet Identity'! It is blocking my access.Remove Internet Identity authentication completely from the admin panel.

acceptanceCriteria: No Internet Identity imports or hooks remain in AdminPanelPage.tsx
No Internet Identity login UI or prompts are displayed on the admin panel page
Admin panel does not attempt to authenticate using Internet Identity

requirements.text: Implement a simple username and password login form on the Admin Panel page with two text input fields labeled 'Username' and 'Password', a 'Login' submit button, and styling consistent with the site's dark theme and neon accent colors.

quotes: Bring back the simple login form with 'Username' and 'Password' fields.

acceptanceCriteria: Login form displays two clearly labeled text input fields: Username and Password
Password field uses type='password' to mask input
Submit button is clearly visible and labeled 'Login'
Form styling matches site's dark theme with neon accents

requirements.text: Implement admin authentication logic in the Admin Panel page that verifies the submitted username is exactly 'admin' and the password is exactly 'habibur123', stores the authenticated session state in sessionStorage, and displays the user management interface only when authenticated.
acceptanceCriteria: Login succeeds when username='admin' and password='habibur123'
Login fails with error message for any other credentials
Authenticated state is stored in sessionStorage
User management interface is hidden until login succeeds
Session persists across page navigation within the same browser session

requirements.text: Update the getAllUsers query hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to call the backend getAllUsers method using the backend actor without requiring any Internet Identity authentication, handle the response data correctly, and display meaningful error messages with full error details if the call fails.

quotes: Stop adding 'Internet Identity'! It is blocking my access.

acceptanceCriteria: getAllUsers query does not require Internet Identity authentication
Query successfully calls backend getAllUsers method
Response data is properly parsed and returned to components
Error messages include full error details for debugging

requirements.text: Update the AdminPanelPage component (frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx) to trigger the getAllUsers query immediately after successful admin login using the simple username/password authentication, display a clear loading state while fetching, show the full error message if the fetch fails, and render the UserListTable component with the fetched user data when successful.

quotes: Ensure that after login, the 'Approve' button is visible next to each user.

acceptanceCriteria: getAllUsers query is triggered immediately after successful login
Loading spinner or message displays while fetching user data
Error messages are clearly displayed if fetch fails
UserListTable renders with fetched user data on success
Approve button is visible for each pending user in the table

requirements.text: Verify that the UserListTable component (frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx) displays an 'Approve' button next to each user with status='Pending', and wire the button click to call the backend approveUser function without requiring Internet Identity authentication, refresh the user list on success, and display a success toast message.

quotes: Ensure that after login, the 'Approve' button is visible next to each user.

acceptanceCriteria: Approve button is visible next to each pending user
Button click calls approveUser without Internet Identity authentication
User list refreshes automatically after successful approval
Success message displays after approval
Approve button is properly sized for mobile (minimum 44x44px touch target)

requirements.text: Remove or disable any Internet Identity authentication initialization from frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts that might interfere with admin panel operations, ensuring the backend actor can be created and used without requiring Internet Identity login.

quotes: Stop adding 'Internet Identity'! It is blocking my access.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor can be initialized without Internet Identity
Admin panel operations work without Internet Identity authentication
No Internet Identity login prompts appear for admin operations

constraints: Preserve the existing user registration and login system for regular users
Keep the backend user management functions (getAllUsers, approveUser) unchanged
Maintain the existing UserListTable component structure and mobile responsiveness
Do not modify the admin credentials format or storage mechanism beyond what's specified
nonGoals: Implementing encrypted or hashed admin password storage
Adding multi-admin support or role-based access control
Modifying the regular user authentication flow
Changing the backend user approval workflow
Adding password reset functionality for admin
